column4: I have a problem :( Whenever I try to run sudo apt-get update I get this: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/52674/
did you try downloading the .deb file to replace the apt-get
I did not. What do you mean?
did you try sudo aptitude update
Gives me the exact same errors
can you get out to the web?
Yeah, it's on this machine that I get the error, Firefox and Chatzilla works just fine
apt-get clean && apt-get update
E: Could not open lock file /var/cache/apt/archives/lock - open (13 Permission denied) | E: Unable to lock the download directory
sudo
same error as before then: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/52674/
what ver of ubuntu
what version of ubuntu
what did you modify last?
Only thing I did after install from live cd was setup the network to static ip
from command line can you ping google.com
Yep, works fine
do a route -n
pm me
Gah, have to register, hold on
